task: Production running OLD code - missing Appearance section entirely
message: CRITICAL: Production server is NOT running latest code! The Appearance section (dark mode toggle) is completely missing from the settings dropdown. This feature was added in commit 0193c93. Production appears to be running code from BEFORE this commit. Please verify git status and do a fresh pull + rebuild.

action_required.task: Verify git status and force fresh deployment
commands: # 3. Stash any local changes if needed
git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/main
# 5. Verify we have the dark mode commit
# 8. Rebuild from scratch with no cache
verification: # 2. FIRST section should be 'Appearance' with Sun/Moon/Monitor buttons
# 3. Click Moon button - page should turn dark
# 4. Click Sun button - page should turn light

diagnosis.symptom: Settings dropdown missing Appearance section entirely
diagnosis.expected: Appearance section should be FIRST in dropdown with 3 theme buttons
diagnosis.actual: Dropdown shows Connect Music Services first, no Appearance section
diagnosis.root_cause: Production running code from before commit 0193c93
commits_needed: 0193c93 - Add dark mode with Light/Dark/System toggle
500e648 - Fix Appearance section not showing in Safari/Brave
